title: NCAA Football Championship (Philippines)
text:
The <a href="National%20Collegiate%20Athletic%20Association%20%28Philippines%29">National Collegiate Athletic Association</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> championship is held every early part of the year (January).
The football season is divided into two conferences (tournaments). Out of the eight NCAA schools, only four fields a team in the football tournament.
The teams face each other once every conference. The teams with the most points on the <a href="league%20table">league table</a> advances in the Championship game.
If a team wins both conferences, the Championship game is omitted, and the winning team from both conferences is the champion.
Champions.
<br>
Number of championships by school.
<br>
